titles.title: Providing for consideration of the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 1591) making emergency supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2007, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-110, by Ms. Slaughter.
All points of order against the conference report and against its consideration are waived. The conference report shall be considered as read.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 45.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 332.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 226 - 195 (Roll no. 264).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 4/25/2007--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the conference report on H.R. 1591 (U.S. Troop Readiness, Veterans' Care, Katrina Recovery, and Iraq Accountability Appropriations Act, 2007).
